title: trying to reconnect prob
body: it happens for like 2 month now and its not ok . when i log in after 2 min i get trying to reconnect error and goes away after like 30 sec and then it comes back again now i got low priority because of that and i cant play because it stop my queue every time riot you need to fix this because its not my prob i tried everything to fix this

replies.body:
It sucks to hear that this has been happening for so long, and I want to help!  Even though you are returning to the game you are still gone for a period of time, and the [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) system treats all leaves equally.  

I suggest going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and tune up your network.  Make sure to test it in a custom game to prevent any further penalties.Let me know if you run into any issues.
